ComicInfo.Title: Mistaken Identites
ComicInfo.Summary: Deadpool quickly goes to a bar where all the loser heroes hung out and got the information where T-Ray was. He finds out that it is a farmhouse in NJ he busts throught the window which he then is kicked out of because it is the wrong farm house. He then goes to the right farmhouse and tells T-ray how in so many ways how T-ray is not the real Wade Wilson and remembers it all since Cable healed his memory. He then saves Outlaw and Sandi and goes back home. Then finds out that providence is being attacked by a giant alien with no Cable to be seen.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:01:06. [CVDB108553]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent-X, Black Box, Bob, Agent of HYDRA, Cable, Cannonball, Deadpool, Iceman, Irene Merryweather, Mystique, Omega Sentinel, Outlaw, Sandi, T-Ray, Weasel
